title: lua-luafilesystem fails, lua object has no attribute lua64_lib_dir.
body:
[edit, add system info]

Installing lua-luafilesystem fails, 

```
==> Error: AttributeError: 'Lua' object has no attribute 'lua64_lib_dir'
```

Additional details below.

This might be connected to @gartung's [recent commit](https://github.com/spack/spack/commit/331f5f27eb51340978c920a4b86ea9dcc625a854).

Expected it to be installed.
